headline: Super Bowl Ads You Won’t See This Year
abstract: Many viewers don’t care about the game but watch for the commercials. Not these.
lead_paragraph: Attention, if you or a loved one received a diagnosis of chronic traumatic encephalopathy, or C.T.E., you may be entitled to financial compensation. C.T.E. is caused by repeated head injuries and linked to playing professional football. Please, don’t wait. Call 1-555-STOP-NFL for a free legal consultation and a claims packet.
